text.textblock: Pursuant to Public Law 92-463, the National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS), Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), announces the following meetings.
NCVHS Subcommittee on Long-Term Care Statistics.
Room 703A, Hubert H. Humphrey Building, 200 Independence Avenue, SW., Washington DC 20201.
The subcommittee will work on its report and revise its charge. Afterward, members will receive a briefing on disability-related risk adjusters and long-term care data needs for health care reform.
Joint meeting of NCVHS Subcommittees on State and Community Health Statistics and Long-Term Care Statistics.
Room 703A, Hubert H. Humphrey Building, 200 Independence Avenue, SW., Washington, DC 20201.
The subcommittees will meet jointly to discuss issues related to State and local long-term care data.
NCVHS Subcommittee on State and Community Health Statistics.
Room 703A, Hubert H. Humphrey Building, 200 Independence Avenue, SW., Washington, DC 20201.
The subcommittee will meet to discuss issues related to State and community health statistics and to develop a work plan for the coming year.

Substantive program information as well as summaries of the meetings and a roster of committee members may be obtained from Gail F. Fisher, Ph.D., Executive Secretary, NCVHS, NCHS, room 1100, Presidential Building, 6525 Belcrest Road, Hyattsville, Maryland 20782, telephone 301/436-7050.

doctitle.textblock: National Committee on Vital and Health Statistics (NCVHS); Meetings

signjob.textblock: Associate Director for Policy Coordination, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
